vraag.vraagstelling: How do I get my QA in the gadget?
vraag.antwoord: You can type a url to an xml-file in one of the options of the gadget. This xml-file has to have a specific structure.

vraag.vraagstelling: Well, please can you give me an example of this xml-file?
